Package View.Pages

Class GamePanel

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
View.Pages.GamePanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, Observer, Accessible
public class GamePanel extends JPanel implements Observer
Class used to display the actual game. It is the Observer of the UnoGameTable, so that it can be updated after every change in the model. It provides every method and attributes used for drawing cards, infos and animation.
Author:
D'annibale Luigi, Venturini Daniele
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GamePanel

      public GamePanel(ViewPlayer[] viewPlayers)
      Creates the GamePanel with the ViewPlayers of the game. Constants variables needed for the paint method are calculated here and then the repaint thread is called
      Parameters:
      viewPlayers -

      Initialize the main components of the panel

    • choseColorByUser

      public Color choseColorByUser()
      Method called when the user plays a Wild Card, to provide a color chosen by the user. Cannot be closed without choosing a color
      Returns:
      the color chosen

    • chosePlayerToSwap

      public Player chosePlayerToSwap()
      Method called when the user plays a seven card in seveno game mode, to provide a player to swap cards with. Cannot be closed without choosing a player
      Returns:
      the player chosen

      Sleeps a random time between the given min and max milliseconds.
      Parameters:
      min -
      max -

    • asyncAITurn

      private void asyncAITurn(UnoGameTable gameTable)
      Async method to let the AIPlayers play without blocking the main window. It does everything about the game turn, from shouting uno to playing
      Parameters:
      gameTable - needed to call methods in the model

    • playCardAnimation

      public Animation playCardAnimation(ViewRotatableCard card)
      Method called to display the play card Animation, given the ViewCard. The ViewCard in the hand of the player becomes invisible, to give the feeling of instant playing, while the animation uses another ViewCard If the animation is already running, it does nothing
      Parameters:
      card - the card to play
      Returns:
      the running animation that can be waited

    • drawCardAnimation

      public Animation drawCardAnimation(ViewPlayer currentViewPlayer, ViewRotatableCard drawnCard)
      Method called to display the draw card animation, given the current ViewPlayer and the ViewCard. If the animation is already running, it does nothing
      Parameters:
      currentViewPlayer - the player that played the card
      drawnCard - the card drawed
      Returns:
      the running animation that can be waited

    • flipCardAnimation

      public Animation flipCardAnimation(ViewCard drawnCard)
      Method called to display the flip card animation when the user is drawing, given the ViewCard. If the animation is already running, it does nothing
      Parameters:
      drawnCard - the card drawed
      Returns:
      the running animation that can be waited

    • shoutUnoAnimation

      public void shoutUnoAnimation(Player player)
      Method called to display the shout uno animation, given the Player that has one card. If the Player is an AIPlayer, it may not say uno
      Parameters:
      player -

    • exposedAnimation

      public Animation exposedAnimation()
      Method called to display the expose player animation, when a player has one card and didnt said uno.
      Returns:
      the running animation that can be waited

    • animationRunning

      public boolean animationRunning(Animation anim)
      Checks if the given animation is alive, i.e. is running
      Parameters:
      anim -
      Returns:
      true if alive, false otherwise

    • drawLadder

      private void drawLadder(Graphics2D g2)
      Draws the Win ladder, displaying the player in descending order of the points
      Parameters:
      g2 -

    • getCardsWidth

      private int getCardsWidth(ViewPlayer player, int cardsSpace)
      Calculates the width needed by each ViewPlayer's card to draw. If the cards to draw are 0, then catch the exception and returns the given cards space
      Parameters:
      player -
      cardsSpace - the total width of the cards
      Returns:
      the draw width for each card

    • drawHorizontalHand

      private void drawHorizontalHand(ViewPlayer player, Graphics2D g2, int y)
      Parameters:
      player -
      g2 -
      y -

    • drawVerticalHand

      private void drawVerticalHand(ViewPlayer player, Graphics2D g2, int x)
      Parameters:
      player -
      g2 -
      x -

    • drawNames

      private void drawNames(ViewPlayer viewPlayer, int x, int y, Graphics2D g2, int imageX, int imageY)
      Given the x and y it draws the name of the given ViewPlayer with a small colorful background, based on the player status. Then it draws the profile picture at the given imageX and imageY. It saves the position of players' name on screen so that they can be clickable in order to be exposed. If the player is the user it draws the strings to shout uno and to skip turn, based on the necessity, and saves their position.
      Parameters:
      viewPlayer - the player to draw
      x - the x on screen
      y - the y on screen
      g2 - graphic object
      imageX - the x of the profile picture
      imageY - the x of the profile picture

    • resumeGame

      public void resumeGame()
      Resumes the paused game. If the user changed the deck color the cards are updated

    • pauseGame

      public void pauseGame()
      Pause the game

    • stopTimer

      public void stopTimer()
      Sets to flag to reapint the view to false and stop all running animations
